sections.heading: Commencement of the right to fruits.The usufructuary's right to fruits commences on the effective date of the usufruct.Acts 1976, No. 103, ยง1.
sections.text: Commencement of the right to fruits.The usufructuary's right to fruits commences on the effective date of the usufruct.Acts 1976, No. 103, ยง1.
